camel.sink.path.host.name: camel.sink.path.host
camel.sink.path.host.description: The host where Redis server is running.

camel.sink.endpoint.channels.name: camel.sink.endpoint.channels
camel.sink.endpoint.channels.description: List of topic names or name patterns to subscribe to. Multiple names can be separated by comma.

camel.sink.endpoint.command.name: camel.sink.endpoint.command
camel.sink.endpoint.command.description: Default command, which can be overridden by message header. Notice the consumer only supports the following commands: PSUBSCRIBE and SUBSCRIBE One of: [PING] [SET] [GET] [QUIT] [EXISTS] [DEL] [TYPE] [FLUSHDB] [KEYS] [RANDOMKEY] [RENAME] [RENAMENX] [RENAMEX] [DBSIZE] [EXPIRE] [EXPIREAT] [TTL] [SELECT] [MOVE] [FLUSHALL] [GETSET] [MGET] [SETNX] [SETEX] [MSET] [MSETNX] [DECRBY] [DECR] [INCRBY] [INCR] [APPEND] [SUBSTR] [HSET] [HGET] [HSETNX] [HMSET] [HMGET] [HINCRBY] [HEXISTS] [HDEL] [HLEN] [HKEYS] [HVALS] [HGETALL] [RPUSH] [LPUSH] [LLEN] [LRANGE] [LTRIM] [LINDEX] [LSET] [LREM] [LPOP] [RPOP] [RPOPLPUSH] [SADD] [SMEMBERS] [SREM] [SPOP] [SMOVE] [SCARD] [SISMEMBER] [SINTER] [SINTERSTORE] [SUNION] [SUNIONSTORE] [SDIFF] [SDIFFSTORE] [SRANDMEMBER] [ZADD] [ZRANGE] [ZREM] [ZINCRBY] [ZRANK] [ZREVRANK] [ZREVRANGE] [ZCARD] [ZSCORE] [MULTI] [DISCARD] [EXEC] [WATCH] [UNWATCH] [SORT] [BLPOP] [BRPOP] [AUTH] [SUBSCRIBE] [PUBLISH] [UNSUBSCRIBE] [PSUBSCRIBE] [PUNSUBSCRIBE] [ZCOUNT] [ZRANGEBYSCORE] [ZREVRANGEBYSCORE] [ZREMRANGEBYRANK] [ZREMRANGEBYSCORE] [ZUNIONSTORE] [ZINTERSTORE] [SAVE] [BGSAVE] [BGREWRITEAOF] [LASTSAVE] [SHUTDOWN] [INFO] [MONITOR] [SLAVEOF] [CONFIG] [STRLEN] [SYNC] [LPUSHX] [PERSIST] [RPUSHX] [ECHO] [LINSERT] [DEBUG] [BRPOPLPUSH] [SETBIT] [GETBIT] [SETRANGE] [GETRANGE] [PEXPIRE] [PEXPIREAT] [GEOADD] [GEODIST] [GEOHASH] [GEOPOS] [GEORADIUS] [GEORADIUSBYMEMBER]

camel.sink.endpoint.connectionFactory.name: camel.sink.endpoint.connectionFactory
camel.sink.endpoint.connectionFactory.description: Reference to a pre-configured RedisConnectionFactory instance to use.

camel.sink.endpoint.redisTemplate.name: camel.sink.endpoint.redisTemplate
camel.sink.endpoint.redisTemplate.description: Reference to a pre-configured RedisTemplate instance to use.

camel.sink.endpoint.serializer.name: camel.sink.endpoint.serializer
camel.sink.endpoint.serializer.description: Reference to a pre-configured RedisSerializer instance to use.

camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.name: camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer
camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding.name: camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding
camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding.description: Whether the endpoint should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous.name: camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous
camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous.description: Sets whether synchronous processing should be strictly used, or Camel is allowed to use asynchronous processing (if supported).

camel.component.spring-redis.lazyStartPr.name: camel.component.spring-redis.lazyStartProducer
camel.component.spring-redis.lazyStartPr.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.component.spring-redis.basicProper.name: camel.component.spring-redis.basicPropertyBinding
camel.component.spring-redis.basicProper.description: Whether the component should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities
